column5: Awesome smallies Chonger good luck at the Lake S open you'd have a good start with those 3 piggers
those fish are so big they're ugly. Lake Simcoe gluttons!

The 6lbs. 10 oz. fish was 22 3/4" long and had a amazing 19" girth! Footballs indeed, now 5 of those in the Simcoe Open wouldn't be too much to ask for?  I'll be out most of this week, hope to find some even bigger ones!
Insane fish!!!  oink oink!!
WOW now that's some sweet looking Smallies SBK
now that's a slob.
Now these are fish worthy of Epic,Awesome and Incroyable............
6 lbs. 10 oz. Smallmouth Bass! Another Simcoe mule! My guide client also caught a 5 lbs. 12oz moose as well!
Man o Man David, a Muskie would have a good meal there !  Some great fish there !!
Absolute pigs, David! Congrats.
Over 6lbs! That's crazy
That's an impressive fish, congrats.
footballs!
now that is a smallmouth nice
WTG Chonger, world class fish.
That's a hog Dave .. Always on big On big ones!
wow.!!! awesome fish dave .....
You must have been fishing by the nuclear power plant Dave. Nice fish....   Art
woowwww phenomenal! i need one of those!

Thanks, can get enough of those mules! I just hope that we can get a few of these during the Simcoe Open!Simcoe should be getting better & better as the fall goes on!X Zone Swammers, Slammers & Mizmo tubes RULE! Dave
Real nice toad there David.  Thanks for posting.
Those are some of the fattest smallies I've ever seen. They're almost funny looking lol.  Awesome stuff!
Those are some thick rock carp you got there...
I would say medicine balls or rugby balls ! Great fish Chong !
Dave, did you shrink?  That SMB looks like a tank and bigger than a 6.10 with your big old smile.
Mooooooooooooooo!!!    Those things are cows!
Incredible!
nice fish there David  oh Misfish, Brian we should get out and try for a few..dozen of them...LOL
Ok, get back to ya.
Wow
:rofl2:     Envious pics Dave! Great job!
